last_episode_to_air.name: Tigtone and the Stakes
last_episode_to_air.overview: verything is at or on a stake, and this time we mean it!

name: Tigtone
overview: A quest-addicted hero slashes his way across a satirical fantasy universe with melodramatic ferocity, always obeying the letter of the law but never its spirit.

episodes.name: Tigtone and His Fellowship Of
episodes.overview: Tigtone quests alone, just the way he likes it--until a fellowship is forced upon him.

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Beautiful War
episodes.overview: Lord Festus tasks Tigtone with saving his ugly kingdom from ravaging beauty.

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Wine Crisis
episodes.overview: A catastrophic disaster has struck the kingdom: all the wine has been stolen!

episodes.name: Tigtone and Those Elemental Kings
episodes.overview: Tigtone must collect the essences of four elements to unlock a door.

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Wizard Hunt
episodes.overview: Wizard Hunt is Tigtone's favorite holiday, but this year he too is hunted!

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Freaks of Love
episodes.overview: Tigtone suffers through the worst kind of quest: an escort quest.

episodes.name: Tigtone and His Manless Match
episodes.overview: Tigtone meets Beconka, the only adventurer to rival his skills.

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Cemetery of the Dead
episodes.overview: A fiendish murder plot lures Tigtone into the netherworld.

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Singing Blade
episodes.overview: The ballad of Tigtone and the homicidal sword, sung by the homicidal sword.

episodes.name: Tigtone vs. Nothing
episodes.overview: All the quests in the realm suddenly vanish so Tigtone must fight nothing, itself.

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Seven-Headed Serpent of Kloom
episodes.overview: Tigtone and Helpy face a seven-headed beast, as the title implies--which is true!

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Screaming City
episodes.overview: A deadly plague is not what it sounds like, and Tigtone is the only chosen one who can silence it.

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Chromatic Crossage
episodes.overview: The Zuzzlekin and Fuzzlefolk are in adorable peril, but can Tigtone get his sword back?

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Demon Maze
episodes.overview: In order to escape an endless maze, Tigtone must find the way out!

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Murder Mystery at the Death Tournament
episodes.overview: Tigtone competes in a deadly contest, but a mysterious foe has other plans for him: DEATH.

episodes.name: Tigtone and Tigtone's Island
episodes.overview: An exotic quest on an island of mutants is just the relaxing getaway Tigtone needed.

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Princess Castle
episodes.overview: A haunted castle forces Tigtone and Helpy to be trapped in it and beautiful.

episodes.name: Tigtone and Lord Festus: Credible Threat
episodes.overview: Honor, manliness, living: it's all on the line.

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Prison of Knowledge
episodes.overview: To defeat an evil book, Tigtone must teach history a lesson and Helpy.

episodes.name: Tigtone and the Stakes
episodes.overview: verything is at or on a stake, and this time we mean it!
